sentences.en: [as modifier]a cash-in-hand job.
sentences.cn: 用现金支付的工作。

sentences.en: A French-based pharmaceuticals company ran into cash-flow problems and faced liquidation.
sentences.cn: 法国的一家制药公司陷入资金周转问题，面临清算的危机。

sentences.en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

sentences.en: Buyers might require further assurances before parting with their cash.
sentences.cn: 买方在付现之前可能要求提供进一步的担保。

sentences.en: Cash was taken during a burglary of the apartment.
sentences.cn: 在一次公寓盗窃案中现金被盗。

sentences.en: Companies could not draw money from bank accounts as cash.
sentences.cn: 公司不能从银行账户中提取现金。

sentences.en: Hard-pressed farmers are tempted to cash out by selling their valuable land.
sentences.cn: 陷入困境的农民决意卖掉他们很值钱的土地

sentences.en: He was short of cash after the collapse of his business.
sentences.cn: 在公司倒闭后，他手头缺少现金。

sentences.en: Holidaymakers should beware of using plastic cards in foreign cash dispensers.
sentences.cn: 外出度假时，在外币取款机上使用银行卡一定要小心。

sentences.en: Investors were storing up a lot of cash in anticipation of disaster.
sentences.cn: 投资者预料会出现灾难，正在储备大量现金。

sentences.en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles.
sentences.cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

sentences.en: Profiteers cashed in during the gasoline shortage.
sentences.cn: 投机商人利用石油短缺大捞一笔

sentences.en: She is entitled to a twelfth of the cash.
sentences.cn: 她有权获得这笔钱的1/12。

sentences.en: She was ringing up her sale on an ancient cash register.
sentences.cn: 她正用一台老掉牙的收银机记账。

sentences.en: The figures showed that cash was haemorrhaging from the conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 数据表明，这家集团的现金正在大量流失。

sentences.en: The firm soon started frittering away the cash it was generating.
sentences.cn: 这家公司不久就开始挥霍赚来的钱。

sentences.en: the price was £900 cash down.
sentences.cn: 价钱是900英镑，即付现款。

sentences.en: The war against drug peddling is all about cash.
sentences.cn: 禁毒斗争归根到底是钱的问题。

sentences.en: There are similar charges if you want to cash a cheque or withdraw money at a branch other than your own.
sentences.cn: 如果你在其他银行兑现支票或支取现金，将会产生差不多的手续费。

sentences.en: They prefer to bargain with individual clients, for cash.
sentences.cn: 在现款方面，他们更愿意同散户打交道。

sentences.en: This, after all, is a company which is awash with cash.
sentences.cn: 这毕竟是一家现金充裕的公司。

sentences.en: Traveller’s cheques can be cashed at most hotels for a small charge.
sentences.cn: 大多数酒店都可以兑换旅行支票，收取少量手续费。

phrases.tran_cn: 现金流转表，现金流量表
（尤指为逃避所得税）用现金支付
出售恒产以谋求利益：为了获利而卖掉保存很长时间的财产
把（保单、存折或其他投资）兑成现金
[经]净现金量；[经]现金流量贴现；[经]减少现金流通

trans.tran_en: money in the form of coins or notes rather than cheques,  credit card s  etc
If you cash a cheque, you exchange it at a bank for the amount of money that it is worth
If you cash a cheque, you exchange it at a bank for the amount of money that it is worth
